ua.khpi.hrynevych.task05.subtask06

Class Subtask06

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ua.khpi.hrynevych.task05.subtask06.Subtask06
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Subtask06
extends java.lang.Thread
    Class that creates new file and writes digits to it.
    Version:
    1.0, 03 Dec 2017
    Author:
    Hrynevych Pavlo

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates threads that write digits to the file and after it is done prints the content of the file to the console.
        Parameters:
        args - command line parameters
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are some problems with access to the file
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if there are some problems with working threads
